lines.text: Hey, I thought of one I know you guys definitely haven't heard of.
And I happen to know it's true.
No wait a minute, this isn't that dumb story about the time you and your friends found that pirate ship in an old cave?
I brought some video game cartridges.
What're we supposed to do with video game cartridges?
Oh yeah, I forgot about that.
Well dunk my bread in the gravy. How'd you manage to get yourself in a mess like that?
Those kids are just showoffs. They're all bark, no bite, and I'll tell you something else, I have a feeling they're going to get what's coming to them sooner or later, their kind usually does.
I don't take kindly to rodents like you, stealing my fertilizer, and messing up my fence!
Oh yeah? I'm not the idiot who just blew a hole in it!
Next time I'll catch you in here, I just might blow a hole in you. Make you a member of that there Vietnamese boys' choir.
